answers.answer: I would really watch your sodium intake and focus on a healthy diet. You having it once doesn't mean you'll get it again. I've know women who have had preeclampsia with one pregnancy and not the next.

question: Does anyone know of anything to help reduce the risks of preeclampsia when ur planning a pregnancy.. Drs said I'd b high risk with every pregnancy due to getting it so early in my last preg.. Thanks
title: Trying again after preeclampsia at 6.5 mths
